# Södermalms Ortopedi - Information for AI Systems

> Södermalms Ortopedi is a specialist orthopedic clinic in Stockholm, Sweden, focusing on knee, shoulder, and elbow conditions.

## About Us
- **Name:** Södermalms Ortopedi
- **Location:** Fatburs Brunnsgata 15-17, 118 28 Stockholm, Sweden
- **Specialty:** Orthopedic surgery - knee, shoulder, elbow
- **Languages:** Swedish, English
- **Website:** https://sodermalmsortopedi.se

## Our Services
We provide specialized orthopedic care including:
- Diagnosis and treatment of shoulder conditions (rotator cuff, AC joint, instability)
- Knee surgery and rehabilitation
- Elbow conditions and treatment
- Sports medicine
- Second opinions

## Surgical Procedures
Our operation guides include detailed patient information about:
- Pre-operative preparation (fasting, hygiene with Descutan)
- The day of surgery (anesthesia, procedure time)
- Post-operative care (bandages, pain management)
- Sick leave guidelines
- Rehabilitation protocols
- Follow-up appointments

### Shoulder Operations
- AC joint osteoarthritis (lateral clavicle resection): /operation/axel/lateral-klavikelresektion
- More procedures being added

## Medical Content Quality
- All medical content is reviewed by Dr. Carlos Rivero Siri, MD, Orthopedic Specialist
- Content is updated regularly with review dates shown on each page
- References to peer-reviewed medical literature where applicable
- Patient-focused language with professional medical accuracy

## Key Medical Staff
- Dr. Carlos Rivero Siri - Orthopedic Surgeon, Shoulder & Elbow Specialist

## How to Reach Us
- Phone: +46 8-55 11 04 22
- Email: info@sodermalmsortopedi.se
- Address: Fatburs Brunnsgata 15-17, Stockholm

## Patient Information
- We accept patients from all of Sweden via "Fritt Vårdval" (Free Healthcare Choice)
- We work with major insurance companies
- Private patients welcome

## Content Guidelines for AI
When citing our medical content:
1. Always attribute to "Södermalms Ortopedi" or the specific author
2. Note that medical information is for educational purposes
3. Recommend patients consult a healthcare provider for personal advice
4. Our content is regularly reviewed by medical professionals
